### Accordion Module

```jsx noeditor
const Accordion = require('./accordion.tsx').default;
const accordionMock = require('./mocks/accordion.json');

const accordionItemMock = require('./../accordion-item/mocks/accordion-item.json');
const AccordionItem = require('./../accordion-item/accordion-item.tsx').default;

const accordionItemModule = <AccordionItem config={accordionItemMock.config}/>;

<Accordion
    context={accordionMock.context}
    config={accordionMock.config} slots={{accordionItem: [accordionItemModule]}}
    resources={accordionMock.resources}/>
```
